General.Name: Careplus Group Bhd
General.Description: Careplus Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and processing of gloves in South America, North America, the Asia Pacific, Malaysia, and internationally. The company offers latex exam gloves for use in medical examinations and procedures, diagnostic procedures by dentists, laboratory practices, and food handling practices; nitrile examination gloves; and surgical gloves. In addition, the company manufactures rubber gloves; manufactures, imports, and exports various types of hand gloves; manufactures sterilized vacuum blood collection tubes; provides gloves packaging and warehousing services; and offers hostel management and consultancy services; and repairs and maintains buildings and its related works. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Seremban, Malaysia.
